resources.string: BeautyApp
Next
Useful tips for every day for beauty
Different categories to improve your appearance
Read the tips, apply them every day and you will become more and more beautiful
Categories
body
face
hair
makeup
nails
Regular exfoliation for incredibly smooth skin

There is nothing comparable to the feeling of soft and smooth skin. Regularly use a scrub or hydrophilic exfoliating oil to remove dead cells, stimulate blood circulation and achieve incredible smoothness.
Deep hydration with priority to natural oils

Absorbing natural oils such as shea butter, avocado or olive into your skin will leave it feeling intensely hydrated and nourished. These oils strengthen the skin\'s natural barrier and restore its health and elasticity.
Heartfelt care

When choosing shower gels and soaps, preference should be given to mild formulas to maintain the natural balance of oil and moisture in the skin. This ensures that your skin remains soft and hydrated even after showering.
Double clean for unparalleled cleanliness

Double cleansing is your path to flawless skin. Start with oil or micellar water to effectively remove makeup and impurities. Then use a gentle cleanser to deep clean your pores. This method helps prevent acne and gives your skin an unearthly glow.
Hydration to a new level

After cleansing, be sure to moisturize your skin generously. Use products with hyaluronic acid or other moisturizing ingredients to maintain moisture balance and avoid dryness. Moisturizing is the secret to healthy, youthful skin.
Sun protection

Don\'t forget about sun protection. Regularly use sunscreen with SPF to protect your skin from harmful UV rays, prevent photoaging, and reduce your risk of skin cancer. This is one of the most important steps in facial skin care.
Gentle washing and conditioning

Wash your hair with a mild shampoo suitable for your hair type. After shampoo, use conditioner, applying it only to the ends of your hair to avoid weighing it down. This will help maintain natural volume and shine.
Thermal protection before using thermal devices
If you frequently use a hair straightener, hair dryer, or other thermal devices, be sure to use heat protection products. They will help prevent hair damage and keep it healthy.
Masks and olive oil for intensive nutrition

Use moisturizing hair masks once a week to restore its structure and add shine. Olive oil is also great for deep hydration. Distribute the oil evenly throughout your hair, leave for 30-40 minutes, and then rinse thoroughly.
Proper skin preparation before makeup for long-lasting radiance
Start by cleansing and moisturizing your skin. Then apply a makeup base to create an even finish and improve the longevity of your makeup. This will help your makeup look fresh throughout the day.
Neutral shadows for everyday makeup
For a natural and versatile look, use neutral eyeshadow shades. They are suitable for any time of day and accentuate your natural beauty.
Fixing makeup
Don\'t forget to set your makeup with a setting spray. This will make your makeup last and keep it flawless even during a long day.
Regular care of nails and surrounding skin
Use oils to strengthen your nails and cuticles. Oil massage improves blood circulation and promotes the growth of healthy nails.
Be careful with gel polishes
If you prefer gel polishes, do not overdo it with frequent procedures. Frequently applying and removing gel polish can weaken your nails.
Damage Protection
Wear gloves when working with chemicals or water to prevent nail damage. Also try to avoid excessive use of sharp tools for nail care.
